name: Chain, Inc.
description: Provider of ledger-as-a-service technology that enables organizations to securely track and transfer balances in a token format. The company's blockchain technology helps organizations can securely manage their financial assets in a token format on private ledgers and, soon, seamlessly transfer them across public networks, enabling financial institutions to offer seamless, programmatic and peer-to-peer transfer of digital assets.
one_liner: Provider of ledger-as-a-service technology that enables organizations to securely track and transfer balances in a token format. The company's blockchain technology helps organizations can securely manage their financial assets in a token format on private ledgers and, soon, seamlessly transfer them across public networks, enabling financial institutions to offer seamless, programmatic and peer-to-peer transfer of digital assets.
